title: F1 in Barcelona and Madrid: why Spain will have two grands prix in 2026
summary: This weekend, the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya will host its last Spanish Grand Prix, but it will also be on the F1 calendar next year, along with Madrid. Its future looks less certain after 2026, however
